title: Split an Order for Shipping
description: An online order contains two items, but one is in a different warehouse. The order needs to be split into two separate shipments.

tasks.description: The order management system identifies that items in the order are sourced from different locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's logic flags the order for splitting.

tasks.description: The system automatically splits the single order into two separate fulfillment orders, one for each warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Two new fulfillment requests are created from the original sales order.

tasks.description: Each warehouse picks and packs their part of the order, and the customer receives two separate shipping notifications with two tracking numbers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is fulfilled efficiently from multiple locations.
